all_questions.question: What was the goal of your thesis several years ago?
What approach did you use to transfer translation, and what were its goals?
all_questions.context: So my thesis several years ago had this goal to transfer, so to do translation with the syntactic trees using the synchronous tree substitution grammar approach.

all_questions.question: What layers of description did you want to apply your approach to?
all_questions.context: And I actually wanted to use it both at the surface syntactic level and also at the deep syntactic level which we'll discuss very shortly.

all_questions.question: What was the range of applications for your approach, according to its design?
all_questions.context: And I'll tell you how it ended up when I...

all_questions.question: How did your approach achieve the goals and layers of description mentioned earlier?
